name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AllegroGPT:ChatGPT for Allegro Open AI Writer

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A free AI writer with ChatGPT to help you optimize your listing.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
**New Feature: Free Access to ChatGPT Plus, no OpenAi or ChatGPT Account needï¼**
AllegroGPT  is a free AI-powered listing optimizer that helps Allegro   sellers optimize listing to improve Allegro   search ranking. 
With the help of AllegroGPT , you will never need to search for Allegro   tips or templates for your listings. Just one click, you can get some better listing choices by ChatGPT OpenAI. 

ğŸš€ Features
â€’ Optimize title of Allegro   listing
â€’ Optimize description of Allegro   listing
â€’ Keywords finder and Keyword suggestion
â€’ Copy optimized listing content with one click
â€’ Export optimized listing content as .doc

ğŸš€ How to use
1. Optimize title
    a. Go to listing page of the product
    b. Open the AllegroGPT  and select Title Generator
    c. Search and pick keywords
    d. Click Generate Title button and get suggestion.
2. Optimize description
    a. Go to listing page of the product
    b. Open the AllegroGPT  and select Description Generator
    c. Search and select keywords, and set parameters.
    d. Click Generate Description and get suggestion.

ğŸš€ How it works
AllegroGPT  analyzes current product information such as title, description, keywords and uses ChatGPT to provide you with optimized listing content.
